items.title: Caroline Kennedy brands RFK a 'predator' before confirmation hearing
items.description: In a scathing letter, Caroline Kennedy urges US senators not to confirm her cousin for a top health job.

items.title: Congolese president snubs peace talks over Goma crisis
items.description: The announcement comes as M23 rebels tightened their control over Goma city, seizing its airport.

items.title: Hamilton crashes Ferrari in pre-season testing
items.description: Lewis Hamilton is unhurt after crashing his Ferrari during the Formula 1 team's pre-season testing programme in Spain.

items.title: Garmin users say smartwatches have stopped working
items.description: Its Fenix 8 smartwatches, which retail for just under Â£1,000, are some of the devices to have issues.

items.title: OpenAI says Chinese rivals using its work for their AI apps
items.description: ChatGPT maker says it will need extra protection from US government, following emergence of Chinese rival, DeepSeek.
